attributes.action: Refuse a 2nd EU referendum and invoke article 50 or give us a general election
attributes.additional_details: All the MP's bickering is not helpful and is getting in the way of us moving forward with the business of running the country effectively
attributes.background:
We have spent enough public funds on asking for the nation's opinion already.
We voted out and it is your job as our elected voice to make it happen whether you agree with the majority or not.
If you are not willing to carry out our wishes then give us a general election within 6 months
